entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:10 AM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023
